name: Space Shooter (itch) (Shell Lurker)
description:
its a Space Shooter what can i say? btw the bullet is bullet bill from Mario! =]

its also now mobile compatible! tap on the top half of the screen to go up and the bottom half to go down and tap anywhere on the very right side of the screen to shoot!

for PC or whatever controls its up arrow to go up down arrow to go down and space bar to shoot!

goal of the game: well really this game has no end nor a goal but as i see it you have to get the highest time and score! if you loose track of your old best score dont worry as there it a kinda glitchy high score! 

added more score more asteroids 1 - 4 = 1 / 5 - 9 = 3 / 10 - 49 = 4 / 50+ = 5

NEW: added a scrolling backround!
